intent_atoms.description: The system must always preserve historical tracking of archived sorting and navigation notes in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/199_T3_7_Integrity_Sorting_and_Navigation/.
As a user, I want the next_tasks.md file to focus on remaining T3.7 milestones so that I can easily see what is left to complete.
The checklist for T3.7 must be updated and live alongside the work log.
As a user, I want to see integrity selections expand the Explorer ancestors, focus the outline, and clear #T36-003 when selecting an Integrity selection.
Integrity selections must expand Explorer ancestors, focus the outline and clear #T36-003.

functional_units.name: Archive Prior Integrity Sorting and Navigation
functional_units.description: Archives previous integrity sorting, navigation planning, and ResearchLog preview audit notes to a specified DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE directory for historical tracking.

functional_units.name: Generate Next Tasks Checklist
functional_units.description: Regenerates the next_tasks.md file focusing on remaining T3.7 milestones such as sorting refinements and navigation filters, placing the checklist alongside the work log.

functional_units.name: Monitor Real-World Asset Licensing Blocker
functional_units.description: Preserves and monitors an ongoing real-world asset licensing blocker without adding new permanent blockers.

functional_units.name: Issue Handoff Wiring for Integrity Selections
functional_units.description: Wires issue handoff so that selecting integrity items expands Explorer ancestors, focuses the outline view, and clears a specific task (#T36-003).
